ygData.subject: Re: Malachite in Qeynos? NO MORE?!?!
ygData.msgSnippet: Im sorry but this whole thread is silly.  So what if the prices are different.. That is part of the game. I get my spells a bunch cheaper in Felwithe than
ygData.messageBody:
Im sorry but this whole thread is silly. So what if the prices are
different.. That is part of the game. I get my spells a bunch cheaper
in Felwithe than other places. As in RL life, it expensive to travel
from home atleast you dont have to pay for a hotel evernight. But i
find the loot and experience is worth the trip. IF you think it is bad
being what everrace you are.. Try a Dark Elf.. Most will merchants
will Kill you on sight, if they dont they mostlikely wont sell to you.
Try having to rely on friends to sell for you evernight or traveling
back to the commons or neriak..




From: Vincent Archer <Vincent.Archer@...>

According to myself:
> Merchants are racists. Even in your guildhouse do they rip you. Over the
> 8th level spells, I spare almost a platinum by going back to Felwithe
> over the Freeport prices.

I just made the trip yesterday, after writing down the exact prices
(down
to copper). There's a difference of 2 gold, 8 silver and 1 copper
between
the Freeport prices and the Felwithe prices, adding to over a 1
platinum
when I purchased all the 8 levels spells I wanted (Shock of Frost,
Shadow
Step, Shielding, Eye of Zoom).

It made a large difference. I was unable to purchase all spells if I
remained in Freeport, but making the trip was worth it.

The difference in percentage remains at level 12; there's a 4 gold
difference in prices. I'll see if I still feel the need to spare 2pp over
the 12th level spells.

--
